|vo_07_02_tl         = The stars in the night sky are very beautiful. Not only the sky, but the lake is also full of stars.<br />At night, the city also has many stars.

|vo_09_01_title      = 레이저에 대해 알기・첫 번째
|vo_09_01_subtitle   = More About {character}: I
|vo_09_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 01.ogg
|vo_09_01_tx         = 네 냄새, 착한 냄새. 고기 좋아해?
|vo_09_01_rm         = Ne naemsae, chakhan naemsae. Gogi joahae?
|vo_09_01_tl         = Your smell, kind smell. Do you like meat?

|vo_09_02_title      = 레이저에 대해 알기・두 번째
|vo_09_02_subtitle   = More About {character}: II
|vo_09_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 02.ogg
|vo_09_02_tx         = 넌 강해. 늑대처럼! 너랑 사냥하면 수확이 많아서 좋아
|vo_09_02_rm         = Neon ganghae. Neukdaecheoreom! Neorang sanyanghamyeon suhwagi manaseo joa.
|vo_09_02_tl         = You're strong. Like a wolf! When I hunt with you, it's good to have much harvest.

|vo_09_03_title      = 레이저에 대해 알기・세 번째
|vo_09_03_subtitle   = More About {character}: III
|vo_09_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 03.ogg
|vo_09_03_tx         = 루피카는 「늑대의 집」이… 아냐! 「늑대의 가족」. 내 루피카는 숲속에 있어. 그들은 날 지켜주면서 나한테 루피카라고 했어
|vo_09_03_rm         = Rupikaneun "Neukdae-ui Jip"i... anya! "Neukdae-ui Gajok". Nae Rupikaneun supsoge isseo. Geudeureun nal jimyeojumyeonseo nahante Rupikarago haesseo.
|vo_09_03_tl         = Lupical is not... "Home of Wolves"! "Family of Wolves". My Lupical are in the forest. They protected me and told me that I am Lupical.

|vo_09_04_title      = 레이저에 대해 알기・네 번째
|vo_09_04_subtitle   = More About {character}: IV
|vo_09_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 04.ogg
|vo_09_04_tx         = 난 루피카 밖에 없어.<br />하지만 루피카라고 해도 난 다리가 2개밖에 없어서 진짜 늑대가 될 수 없어. 때때로 마음이 괴로워…
|vo_09_04_rm         = Nan Rupika bakke eopsseo.<br />Hajiman Rupikarago haedo nan dariga dugaebakke eopsseoseo jinjja neukdaega doel su eopsseo. Ttaettaero maeumi goerowo...
|vo_09_04_tl         = I only have Lupical.<br />But even though they say I'm Lupical, I only have two legs so I cannot be an actual wolf. Sometimes I feel distressed...

|vo_09_05_title      = 레이저에 대해 알기・다섯 번째
|vo_09_05_subtitle   = More About {character}: V
|vo_09_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 05.ogg
|vo_09_05_tx         = 너랑 같이 달리면 즐거워, 너랑 같이 사냥하면 즐거워. 너랑 같이 있으면, 내가 늑대이던, 사람이던, 전혀 상관없어<br />넌 내 친구, 넌 내 「루피카」야. 너도 즐거우면 좋겠어
|vo_09_05_rm         = Neorang gachi dallimyeon jeulgeowo, neorang gachi sanyanghamyeon jeulgeowo. Neorang gachi isseumyeon, naega neukdaeideon, saramideon, jeonhyeo sanggwaneopsseo.<br />Neon nae chingu, neon nae "Rupika"ya. Neodo jeulgeoumyeon jokesseo.
|vo_09_05_tl         = It's exciting to run with you, and exciting to hunt with you. With you, it doesn't matter whether I'm a wolf or a human.<br />You are my friend, you are my "Lupical". I hope you are happy too.

|vo_10_01_title      = 레이저의 취미…
|vo_10_01_subtitle   = {character}'s Hobbies
|vo_10_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hobbies.ogg
|vo_10_01_tx         = 루피카가 좋아. 그리고 숲이랑 친구도 좋아. 뛰어다니는 것도 좋아
|vo_10_01_rm         = Rupikaga joa. Geurigo supirang chingudo joa. Ttwieodanineun geotdo joa.
|vo_10_01_tl         = I like Lupical. I also like forest and friends. I like to run around, too.

|vo_10_02_title      = 레이저의 고민…

|vo_10_02_tl         = It's hard to speak, but I have to.

|vo_10_03_tl         = Meat is good. Potato is good.

|vo_10_04_tl         = I hate grass! The guys I eat have grass.

|vo_11_01_title      = 선물 획득・첫 번째

|vo_11_01_tx         = 향도 좋고, 맛도 좋아. 마음에 들어
|vo_11_01_rm         = Hyangdo jotgo, matdo joa. Maeume deureo.
|vo_11_01_tl         = The scent is good, and the taste is good. I like it.

|vo_11_02_title      = 선물 획득・두 번째

|vo_11_02_tl         = I can recover my strength since I ate. I'm Happy.

|vo_11_03_title      = 선물 획득・세 번째

|vo_11_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Receiving a Gift - 03.ogg

|vo_12_01_title      = 생일…

|vo_12_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Birthday.ogg
|vo_12_01_tx         = 오늘은 네가… 그러니까 아주아주 오래전 오늘 태어났잖아. 너랑 같이 놀고 싶어. 오늘 같이 고기 먹자

|vo_12_01_tl         = Today you... I mean, you were born today years ago. I want to play with you. Let's have meat together today.
